title: Calories in Taquitos from 7-Eleven
meta_description: Discover calories in taquitos from 7-11, including macros, sodium, and nutrition for a standard 2-taquito serving, plus tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Frozen beef and cheese taquitos, heated in microwave or oven; standard size (~85 g each); no added dips or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, heating method, and store preparation. Check 7-Eleven packaging or app for exact values.

quick_answer.text: Two 7-Eleven taquitos provide ~420 kcal, 14 g protein, and 48 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp sour cream per taquito

faqs.q: How many calories in one taquito from 7-11?
What are the carbs in taquitos from 7-11?
faqs.a: Two taquitos have ~48 g carbs, mostly from the tortilla.
Yes, two taquitos contain ~800 mg sodiumâ€”watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Calories in chicken vs beef taquitos from 7-11?
faqs.a: Chicken versions are slightly lower at ~190 kcal per taquito.
Typically 0 g trans fat per serving in standard varieties.
